name: open_weekly_water_access
title: Water Service Access
description:
Contains data crowdsourced monthly from Venezuelans through the Premise Data mobile application. The data collects water access indicators at a weekly granularity.

More relevant information below:

- The booklet included [HERE](https://info.premise.com/insights-with-crowdsourcing) goes into more details on how Premise's crowdsourcing works.
